StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [GetProspectEduca.on]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
@ProspectId uniqueiden..er = NULL, @ProspectEduca.onId uniqueiden..er = NULL AS BEGIN
SET TRANSACTION ISOLATION LEVEL READ UNCOMMITTED SET NOCOUNT ON
SELECT pe.ProspectEduca.onId, pe.ProspectId, pe.CompletedDate, pe.Educa.onLevel, pe.Educa.onCode, pe.Educa.onCompleted, pe.LastYearAtended, pe.YearGraduated, pe.SchoolCode, pe.EduStatusCode, pe.EduCreden.alCode, pe.EduProjectedTierCode FROM USMC.ProspectEduca.on pe WHERE (@ProspectId IS NULL OR ProspectId = @ProspectId) AND (@ProspectEduca.onId IS NULL OR ProspectEduca.onId = @ProspectEduca.onId) ORDER BY LastYearAtended DESC
END
